website_summaries.verdict: The F-Lite 275 has not gained the same popularity as its siblings from the Inov-8 family, but it still comes highly rated by the purchasers. Although the shoe is generally not recommended for heavy Olympic weightlifting, it presents a versatile alternative for functional fitness workouts. Comfortable and supportive, it will keep the foot covered for HIIT and moderate weightlifting.
pros: Most buyers have described the shoe as comfortable
Based on multiple reviews, the trainer embodies a good mix of a weightlifting shoe and an all-around workout shoe
More than a few athletes find its support as optimal for lifting light and moderate weights
cons: One purchaser reports that the mesh on the toe box is not protected well enough and gets torn easily

customer_reviews.title: Inov-8 as good as usual, pity about the velcro
customer_reviews.text: I had my first set of 235 F-lites for nearly 4 years before the heel started giving me grief These are a bit more modern in design but obviously stick to the same build principles Great for everyday including medium to heavy lifting, max lifts I use lifting shoes As with other reviews, the velcro is actually a pain in the a***e but does add a little extra support
customer_reviews.author: Osevon

customer_reviews.title: iMovie -8 cross trainers
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought 50 trainers before, gym training is for these F lite 275. They are easy to walk in, in the gym they are firm and have little bounce. Ok ,on the leg press they are awesome, like seriously firm. Best money on gym ever. I will see how they hold up after six days in the gym. Need big legs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.PaulZ

customer_reviews.title: Loving it for circuits classes
customer_reviews.text: Do what they were designed to do. Gives you firm footing on gym floors. Stablises the foot. Makes a huge difference when doing a lot of jumping and left-right movements like in a circuits class. Wouldnt use for running as their is a lot of resistance coming from the soles which felt like you had to use more energy to push off every step. I am size 7.5 UK normally and size 7.5UK fits well and feels roomy at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Newbie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Iv had these a a couple of weeks now and they show no wear or tear, used daily for cross trainning and on watt bikes/rower. A nice light weight cross trainning/ lifting shoe
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good for weight lifting training
customer_reviews.text: Present for Son In Law who does CrossFit training he has found them very good
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C Blundell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. If other ino8 shoes fit you this one will to. I’ve got quite narrow feet and I’ve never had a brand fit me so well. It’s my 3rd pair of inov8s.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Larsson

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday events
customer_reviews.text: Prompt service very fast in delivery, good quality thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mi P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great for the gym, wouldn't recommend as a fashion trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A Clough

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They're ok for the price a little low on quality
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas townsend

customer_reviews.title: Good multipurpose gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good multipurpose gym shoes, not recommended for running but provides stable enough base for squats/lunges.
customer_reviews.author: Kieren

customer_reviews.title: This is the product that i have been looking for as nothing else worked for me.....
customer_reviews.text: When i go to the gym i do quite a bit of heavy weights and also cardio. These trainers a perfect for both.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality training shoe
customer_reviews.text: Cracking training shoes, had various Innov8 shoes over the years and the quality is obvious.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

product_meta.title: inov-8 Men's F-lite 275 Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: Versatility without compromise. An 8mm drop offers cushioning for the run and box jumps, while the power heel delivers a stable platform that helps when performing the deepest of squats. The addition of an upper strap ensures the foot remains firmly locked in place. This training shoe proves that it is possible to have the best of both worlds – speed and lifting – in one package.
feature_bullets: Unrivalled grip: ROPE-TEC system delivers traction and durability on rope climbs. STICKY GRIP rubber outsole delivers outstanding underfoot grip for every workout.
Phenomenal grip: New industry-leading StickyGrip rubber delivers over 50% better traction in the forefoot than its predecessor.
Agility: Next generation META-FLEX technology and optimal multi-directional flexibility moves with the foot, both forward and laterally.

Explosive power: The POWERHEEL is 40% denser than the forefoot of the shoe. Combined with a 8mm drop (heel-to-toe differential), the POWERHEEL provides maximum power and mechanical advantage when lifting weights.
